title: Revitonica
description:
Revitonica is a scientific and practical method of rejuvenation and correction of appearance without injections and operations. Revitonics includes self-massage techniques and physiotherapy exercises, complexes for the rehabilitation of muscles of the face, neck and exercises for posture correction.

Today Revitonika is:
More than 130,000 students worldwide.
Fundamental scientific rationale.
Clinically proven safety.
Professional medical approach.
Expert methodological support for users.

In just a few months, practicing 15 to 30 minutes a day, you will recover:
clear contours of the face;
fullness of the lips;
high position of the cheekbones and cheeks;
subcutaneous fat;
face colour;
texture and smoothness of the skin;
a young jaw line;
neck length;
statics of the cervical spine;
symmetry of the face.

You will reduce or completely eliminate:
mimic wrinkles;
nasolabial and glabellar wrinkles;
folds around the mouth;
drooping eyebrows;
double chin;
deep wrinkles on the forehead;
swelling and bags under the eyes;
wrinkles on the neck.

At the moment, courses are available in the Application:

- Basic course "Basics of rejuvenation"
- Advanced course
- Posture correction
- Revitonika up to 30 years
- Taping
- Intimate rejuvenation
- Medical fitness
- Visceral self-massage of the abdomen
- Youth and radiance of eyes

In the near future, our application will include:
- Thematic webinars
Flew. Anti-aging correction at home
Launching natural rejuvenation. Video courses "Revitonika": How to start and love classes
How to get rid of swelling of the face and body. Home remedies
"Revitonika" in everyday life. Habits that rejuvenate and daily mistakes that age us
Revitonika: first week of classes. We hone the technique and analyze errors
Revitonika's golden fund: posture correction and stoop removal
Is there life after "5 weeks". How to save and multiply the effect of video courses
Restoration of the oval. How to eliminate double chin and tighten the front of the neck
Forehead, nose bridge and eyebrow lift. We erase the past years, improve the mood
How to make your dream lips. Rehabilitation and correction program
We practice "Revitonica" on vacation. Summer anti-aging complex
Youth and radiance of the eyes. Orbital Area Rapid Course
How to quickly put yourself in order to go out
Visceral self-massage of the abdomen
How to get rid of nasolabial folds at home. Myoplastic correction of the nasolabial area
How to reduce the size of the nose and improve its shape. Anti-aging correction
Focus on the face. The most effective techniques in one program
Women's health and beauty. Deep internal massage
Revitonics of emotions. We create internal conditions for rejuvenation and learn the ease of self-control
Restoration of the corner of youth. Soft tissue lifting and correction of the chewing muscles of the face
Myoplastic abdominal correction
Diet of Youth
Youth and sexuality. How our sex life affects our appearance
Muscle recovery after a hard day's work. How to stay fit and fit every day
How to eliminate puffiness of the lower eyelids, paint bags and smooth furrows in the orbital-zygomatic region
How to manage hormones to stay youthful and beautiful
How to remove belly in 15 minutes a day
How to eliminate winter slouching, correct negative postural habits (posture habits), and improve gait
How to eliminate puffiness of the face and body. Daily self-help methods
Revitonika - express help in any situation
How to open up your face and eliminate the effects of stress by relaxing the chewing muscles
How to remove the lower abdomen
How to get rid of a disgruntled face. The secret to working with depressors
Caution: Osteoporosis! What is important for every woman to know
- Express marathon
- New courses
